deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 11 hrs 55 mins
features: HYPOALLERGENIC: Our formula contains a milk protein that is broken down into tiny pieces to virtually eliminate allergic reactions in most babies who are allergic to cow’s milk protein
START FEELING BETTER TODAY: Similac Alimentum starts reducing colic symptoms due to protein sensitivity within 24 hours in most infants
WITH AN IMMUNE-NOURISHING INGREDIENT: First and only hypoallergenic formula with 2'-FL HMO, an immune-nourishing ingredient
SIMILAC IS THE #1 INFANT FORMULA BRAND FED IN HOSPITALS

EBT ELIGIBLE: Eligible to be purchased with Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) benefits in select stores. The SNAP name is a service mark of the US Department of Agriculture. The USDA does not endorse any goods, services, or enterprises
body.description: Similac Alimentum infant formula with 2'-FL HMO is the first and only hypoallergenic infant formula with 2'-FL HMO, a unique immune-nourishing ingredient. It starts reducing colic symptoms due to protein sensitivity in most babies within 24 hours,† so your baby can start feeling better today.† * Due to protein sensitivity. † Based on a clinical study with Alimentum Ready to Feed without DHA, ARA, 2'-FL HMO, lutein, and beta-carotene. A crossover clinical study of infants experiencing colic symptoms due to cow’s milk protein sensitivity showed 5 of 6 infants initiated on Alimentum during the first week achieved a reduction in excessive crying. Data on File, Study AC84, August 2004. Abbott Nutrition, Columbus, Ohio.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Support for Baby’s Immune System Similac Alimentum with 2’-FL human milk oligosaccharide* (HMO) is complete nutrition designed to support your baby’s immune system. 2’-FL HMO is an immune-nourishing prebiotic like that found in breast milk. It is backed by more than 20 years of research. * Not from human milk.

Start Feeling Better Today* Similac Alimentum starts reducing colic symptoms due to protein sensitivity within 24 hours in most infants.* * Based on a clinical study with Similac Alimentum Ready to Feed without DHA, ARA, 2’-FL HMO, lutein, and beta carotene in a small group of infants experiencing colic symptoms due to cow’s milk protein sensitivity. Data on File, Study AC84, August 2004. Abbott Nutrition, Columbus, Ohio. Hypoallergenic and Is Suitable for Lactose Sensitivity Similac Alimentum has protein that is broken down into tiny pieces to virtually eliminate allergic reactions in most babies who are allergic to cow’s milk protein. It is suitable for lactose sensitivity and has DHA and ARA, special nutrients found in breast milk that are important to help support brain and eye development. Quality of Sleep After initiation of Alimentum, 62% of parents reported good to excellent quality of infant sleep vs 10% before initiation.* * Data on file. Similac Alimentum without 2’-FL HMO, lutein and beta carotene 2018. MySimilac Rewards With MySimilac Rewards, get nutrition guidance for you and baby, exclusive benefits, coupons, and much more.

Similac Alimentum Similac Pro-Sensitive Similac Pro-Total Comfort Similac Soy Isomil Suitable for Lactose Sensitvity ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic for Cow's Milk Protein Allergy ✓ Has 2'-FL HMO for Immune Support ✓ ✓ ✓ Complete Nutrition for Sensitive Tummies ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Partially Hydrolyzed Whey Protein for Easy Digestion ✓ Soy-based Protein ✓ Not for infants or children with galactosemia ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Bulk pack of Hypoallergenic baby formula
reviews.reviewText: Easy & convenient purchase. Here in 2-3 days. 6 pack allows me to have bulk on hand when needed. No standing in store to get formula.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love auto ship!
reviews.reviewText: This is my first time doing auto ship and I’ve been so pleased. The product is what I expected and it works wonders on my babies belly. Less reflux is noted with this than the other hypoallergenic type of formula too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Baby Formula If You Need It
reviews.reviewText: This is a specialized baby formula. It will certainly not be needed for every newborn or infant. Some friends recently had a baby girl who was having some digestive and poop issues with regular baby formula.This was the exact formulation that the pediatrician recommended to help the issue. After a couple weeks of using this formula instead of a more standard formula mix, the stomach and digestive issues went away and she could go back to using a more standard baby formula.I guess you never know in advance if your little one will need this formula and if they need it, how long they will need it. When they need it, they need it.It is quite expensive so unless you are sure this will be required for long term feeding you'll probably be better off to just buy a single can to start with and jump to this six pack if it seems like it will be a long term need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lactose intolerant baby formula...
reviews.reviewText: We were looking for a usable product to donate to a local food panty that would fit unique needs. This was an ideal product to fulfill that need. The panty was extremely grateful to receive the formula and had a special need in mind for a lactose intolerant baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Trusted brand and high quality product
reviews.reviewText: Nothing is worse than having a baby with an upset stomach and not being able to narrow down the cause of irritation. When we decided to supplement with formula we didn't want to risk messing up the good routine we had going so opted for a hypoallergenic formula just to be on the safe side. This was a great choice because it was a brand name we trusted and purchasing in bulk made it more cost efficient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This set is a great value! It has everything needed and more — Similac is a reliable brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for sensitive tummy
reviews.reviewText: Baby is finally enjoying eating without the discomfort other formula was causing. Came well packed, no damage. And has 6 full cans to last a while. The price is a bit steep but because it's never in store where I go it's the price I'm willing to pay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This formula is great for babies with sensitive evidence. It comes with plenty & the price is okay. It's easy to use & great for traveling.
